A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Crap direction to take the story\, pointless deaths of integral characters. The rest of the characters are weak with little or no back story including the main heroine and the \"infamous\" snoke. Total crud unless pure CGI is what gets you going. Story\, characters and the lack now of any light vs dark balance ruins the whole franchise. I will be pretending anything other than 4\,5&6 do not exist fir the rest of my life.
